h2_title: The Great Sage's Broken Shell Boss Fight and Guide
h3_title: The Great Sage's Broken Shell Phase Two
content: Using Gingseng Pellets and Ring of Fire will get your Focus up in no time, and Smash Stance is generally favorable here, to land those heavy slamming attacks. Don't forget to throw out the Plantain Fan as soon as it's ready each time, as well, as this is one of the best ways to attack him undisturbed.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Great_Sage's_Broken_Shell.md', within the main section titled 'The Great Sage's Broken Shell', specifically from the subsection 'The Great Sage's Broken Shell Boss Fight and Guide' and the sub-subsection 'The Great Sage's Broken Shell Phase Two'.
The content is as follows:
Using Gingseng Pellets and Ring of Fire will get your Focus up in no time, and Smash Stance is generally favorable here, to land those heavy slamming attacks. Don't forget to throw out the Plantain Fan as soon as it's ready each time, as well, as this is one of the best ways to attack him undisturbed.
